name: Corsola
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Pursued by Mareanie for the branches on its head, this Pokémon will sometimes snap its own branches off as a diversion while it escapes.

attacks.name: Bubble Shoot
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
